response.overview: Millions around the world have enjoyed reading the books of James Herriot, as well as watching the TV series “All Creatures Great and Small.” But long before the fame, the Yorkshire veterinarian and his son took a long-distance walk through the heart of the Yorkshire Dales. The Herriot Way follows in their footsteps, and Chris and Lorena Linke take you on this spectacular journey.
response.tagline: Follow in the footsteps of James Herriot on a stunning walk through the Yorkshire Dales.
response.title: The Herriot Way
